on reading compounds: 筆【フデ】writing brush, paintbrush, pen, writing with a brush, drawing with a brush, penmanship, something drawn with a brush, writing (composing text), the written word, (land) lot, plot
筆順【ヒツジュン】stroke order (esp. of a Chinese character)
自筆【ジヒツ】one's own handwriting, autograph, holograph
kun reading compounds: 筆【ふで】writing brush, paintbrush, pen, writing with a brush, drawing with a brush, penmanship, something drawn with a brush, writing (composing text), the written word, (land) lot, plot
筆跡【ひっせき】handwriting, calligraphy specimen, example of penmanship, holograph
面相筆【めんそうふで】fine-point brushes
焼き筆【やきふで】wooden stick with a burned tip (used to create underdrawings)
